General.Name: City Service SE
General.Description: City Service SE, together with its subsidiaries, provides facility management and integrated utility services in Lithuania, Poland, Spain, and Latvia. The company engages in the administration of residential apartment buildings, commercial buildings, dwelling-houses, public buildings, and industrial buildings; and maintenance and repair of engineering systems. It is also involved in the management and renovation of energy resources; technical and energy audit of buildings; maintenance and cleaning of territories and premises; and construction and maintenance of gas stations. In addition, the company engages in the sale of electricity; asset management; real estate management; supply chain management; construction and engineering activities; and IT, security, accommodation, debt collection, insurance, and energy saving services, as well as elevator installing, maintenance, and tech support services. City Service SE is headquartered in Vilnius, Lithuania. City Service SE is a subsidiary of UAB Unit Invest.
